item.title: Mark add a quote by Mark Haskell Smith
item.description: "The fact that, in the United States, there are people serving ten-year prison terms for growing marijuana plants in their backyards while Wall Street racketeers, who have defrauded millions of people and destroyed the global economy, walk free is a kind of bizarre hypocrisy that boggles my mind." -- Mark Haskell Smith

item.title: Mark add a quote by Mark Haskell Smith
item.description: "One bullet can really fuck up your day." -- Mark Haskell Smith

item.title: Mark add a quote by George Plimpton
item.description: "I have never been convinced there's anything inherently wrong in having fun. " -- George Plimpton

item.title: Mark add a quote by Jim Harrison
item.description: "I like grit, I like love and death, I'm tired of irony. ... A lot of good fiction is sentimental. ... The novelist who refuses sentiment refuses the full spectrum of human behavior, and then he just dries up. ... I would rather give full vent to all human loves and disappointments, and take a chance on being corny, than die a smartass." -- Jim Harrison

item.title: Mark add a quote by Ovid
item.description: "Let others praise ancient times; I am glad I was born in these." -- Ovid
